home.title: Slidy
home.desc: Travel your favorite city without restrictions!

aboutUs.headline: See the City Through the Eyes of a Local!
aboutUs.text: If you are a blogger who loves to explore the city in search of hidden gems and you have routes that you particularly enjoy, you can sell them on our site! For travel blogger fans, this is a chance to walk the same path your idol once took.

aboutUs.headline: Not Just for Guides
aboutUs.text:
If you are a blogger who loves to explore the city in search of hidden gems and you have routes that you particularly enjoy, you can sell them on our site!

For travel blogger fans, this is a chance to walk the same path your idol once took.

aboutUs.headline: Earn Money with Your Local Knowledge
aboutUs.text: If you are a guide or wish to become one, you can upload your offers to our site! After registering as a tourist, you can apply to be verified as a guide. Then, you need to fill out your personal page with your excursions and wait for messages from clients. By the way, anyone can become a guide on our platform! According to our statistics, more than 40% of people are willing to guide tourists in their city in their free time. This not only helps break the monotony of daily life but also allows you to earn some money using your local knowledge!

register.headline: Register!
register.caption: Fill out a simple form providing your information, which we will use to connect you with the best guides in the city!

filter.headline: FILTER!
filter.caption: Our site allows you to choose the most convenient time and the best location using filters and a calendar!

choose.headline: CHOOSE!
choose.caption: Find the best guide for your journey and get to know the locals!

wander.headline: WANDER!
wander.caption: Immerse yourself in your dream trip and discover the city through the eyes of a local!

join.headline: JOIN!
join.caption: By uploading the necessary documents, tourists will be more inclined to book your excursions!

create.headline: CREATE!
create.caption: Use our proposal builder to describe your future excursion to tourists!

earn.headline: EARN!
earn.caption: By conducting tours, earn some extra cash while having a great time with new people!

waitList.headline: Eager to Try It All?
waitList.description:
Our site is currently under development. We're working hard to enhance your travel experiences as soon as possible. If you want to be the first to know when we're ready, please leave your email address in the field below.
Once everything is set, we'll contact you at that address.

whoWeAre.headline: Who Are We?
whoWeAre.description: We are a team of student programmers who recently arrived in Lviv and realized we didn't know the area at all! That's when we found each other and started working on Slidy.
